article_title: What video and eyewitness accounts tell us about Gazans killed around aid convoy
sentence: What  video  and  eyewitness  accounts  tell  us  about  Gazans  killed  around  aid  convoy  T-I-T-L-E-E-N-D.

article_title: What video and eyewitness accounts tell us about Gazans killed around aid convoy
sentence: At  least  112  Palestinians  were  killed  as  crowds  rushed  around  lorries  delivering  desperately  needed  food  aid  in  the  small  hours  of  Thursday  morning,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: What video and eyewitness accounts tell us about Gazans killed around aid convoy
sentence: In  addition  to  the  dead,  760  people  were  injured,  the  ministry  said.

article_title: What video and eyewitness accounts tell us about Gazans killed around aid convoy
sentence: "They  were  fired  at  directly  and  prevented  people  to  come  near  those  killed.  "

article_title: What video and eyewitness accounts tell us about Gazans killed around aid convoy
sentence: Dr  Mohamed  Salha,  interim  hospital  manager  at  al-Awda  hospital,  where  many  of  the  dead  and  injured  were  taken,  told  the  BBC:  "Al-Awda  hospital  received  around  176  injured  people. . .  142  of  these  cases  are  bullet  injuries  and  the  rest  are  from  the  stampede  and  broken  limbs  in  the  upper  and  lower  body  parts.  "

article_title: What video and eyewitness accounts tell us about Gazans killed around aid convoy
sentence: Update:  The  IDF  said  on  3  March  that  an  initial  review  had  confirmed  that  "the  majority  of  Palestinians  were  killed  or  injured  as  a  result  of  the  stampede.  "
